PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot leave blank for no prefix prefix `| . | .!*`

SESSION_ID.description: input bot session id here the one you received when you paired

DATABASE_URL.description: input a database url you can use either postgresql or mognodb to save your bot changes and save your database check our youtube page for tutorials on how to

THUMB.description: This image will show when you used a 2/3 menu type add your image url for multiple images use , as split to send image randomly leave blank to use default

START_MSG.description: Set to true after the welcome message has been sent to prevent spamming on Heroku restarts.

OWNER_NAME.description: put your bot owner name here

TIME_ZONE.description: set your desired timezone continuent follow by your city mistake might cause error in console or crash the bot

MENU_TYPE.description: set your desired menu type 1 for only plain text, 2 for thumbnail menu 3 for only image menu leave blank to set to default

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + ",").

SUDO.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be sub admin for the bot for multiple number , as split (should be in international format without + ",").

PACK_NAME.description: This would show as your sticker packname leave blank to use default

REACT.description: To enable auto reaction when set to cmd it bring a reaction animation to plugin command but when set to all it send reaction to all messages leave blank to off

MODE.description: Use this to set your bot mode to either public or private when in public everyone has access when it private only bot owner and sudo have access

CALL.description: to toggle anticall either to block caller when set to block and reject to reject call only leave blank to off

STATUS.description: set true to make the bot automatically view your status

READ.description: Set true to make the bot automatically read your messages

WELCOME.description: To automatically turn on welcome message in all group

GOODBYE.description: To automatically turn on goodbye message in all group

AUTHOR.description: This would show as your sticker author leave blank to use default

WARN.description: how many times you want the bot should warn user before bot tke action

CONSOLE.description: turn on to let it display incoming message on console

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: input the same field you added in your heroku name above

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: generate a heroku api key to set your var after deployment go to settings then you would see an api key click on generate then copy and paste

SYMBOL.description: This will show as the bot symbol before the menu

ANTIDELETE.description: Enable antidelete when no panel DB setting is present. Accepts 1, true, yes (case-insensitive).
